sentences.sContent: Their economy is teetering on the brink of collapse.
sentences.sCn: 他们的经济正摇摆于崩溃的边缘。

sentences.sContent: ...Some experts say that the rain forest is already at the brink of collapse...

remMethod.val: 想要喝水(drink)， 于是来到河边(brink)

words.tran: 边缘政策；紧急政策，外交冒险政策

trans.tranOther: a situation when you are almost in a new situation, usually a bad one
